items.text: back of a length outside off, he stays back and whips it to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Gustav: "I guess the only question remaining for WI is whether Hope can get a century. Nothing else really matters, as I cannot see them win this match"
items.text: fuller ball, shaping into the batsman who wanted to send it screaming to the cover fence. No contact, and the ball goes through to the keeper between bat and pad, just outside off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Roach, no run

items.text: stays back to clip this to deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Roach, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, off-cutter, wristed to wide long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball outside off, he wanted to flay it through the offside, ends up chopping on the ground to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Roach, no run

items.text: given lbw and he's reviewed it that was just going on with the angle, strikes him below the knee roll from back of a length, but was it missing leg? Struck him in front of middle and leg. He was trying to flick it off the back foot. No bat involved, as Ultra Edge confirms, and it's clipping leg-stump too. Umpire's call, so Roach has to go. The umpire seemed to almost forget he had given it out
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Roach, OUT

dismissal.text: KAJ Roach lbw b Mashrafe Mortaza 3 (8b 0x4 0x6) SR: 37.50

items.preText: Shai Hope's batting on 93. West Indies are nine down. Even if they lose this, at least Hope can score back to back centuries
items.text: he's not farming the strike. Pushes into the off side, where there are large gaps and jogs across for a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball outside off, confidently pushed to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: fuller ball on off, driven towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: good length outside off, but Bishoo confidently goes on the front foot to defend to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: fuller, angling into the batsman, but he shows the full face again to block it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.text: strays on the pads, and flicked away nicely to midwicket for a couple, to ensure Hope is on strike for the next over
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, 2 runs

items.text: back to back centuries for Shai Hope length ball, but Hope dances down the track. Doesn't quite get to the pitch of it, but follows through with the stroke to hit it over long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, SIX runs
Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: drags it a bit short and he rocks back to pull powerfully, but short midwicket gets a hand to it to slow down the progress of the ball
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up outside off, Bishoo drives it back past the bowler, freeing his arms
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: good length on leg stump, he went down to sweep but the ball wasn't full enough for it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: good length on leg stump again, he comes forward but waits for the ball and tickles it to short fine leg
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Prashant Banjar: "What a way to get to a hundred hope you little beauty...."
items.text: back of a length angling across, he flat-bats it to deep cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, he pushes at it, gets a thick inside edge that rolls to mid-on
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, 1 run

items.text: good length, angled across, he opens the face to guide it to short third man. wants a single but is sent back, rightfully so. The throw came rifling in
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: given room outside off, with Fizz angling it too far across, and he drives on the up, over cover. But there is a sweeper to clean up
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

items.text: angled across, but very full, allowing him to square drive it from one knee
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller length well outside off, he nudges it to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bishoo, no run

items.preText: Fredrik Erling: "Extras has played a fine innings yet again for WI with 3rd top score. It's a bit of a mystery why they don't place him(?) higher up the order?" - Extras is gender fluid. Him in a men's game, her in a women's game...
items.text: digs it in short. Hope went on the back foot early, but got a top edge that pinged off his shoulder and into the leg side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 1 run
